title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, and memory management.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: A comprehensive guide to understanding and implementing algorithms for efficient problem-solving.

title: Introduction to C++
description: Master the advanced features of C++ programming, including object-oriented and generic programming.

title: Intro to Data Structures
description: Explore various data structures and their applications in computer science.

title: Introduction to Python
description: An in-depth course on Python programming, from basic to advanced topics.

description: Learn the principles and practices of software engineering for developing high-quality software.

title: Introduction to AWS
description: Get started with AWS and cloud computing, including core services and best practices.

title: Introduction to MySQL
description: A complete course on MySQL, covering database design, querying, and administration.

title: Intro to Problem Solving
description: Develop your problem-solving skills with practical examples and exercises.
